sentences.sentence: Cavers pass surreally shaped pale limestone formations inside Black Hands Cave.
sentences.translation: 图为洞穴探险家们在黑手洞里奇幻苍白的石灰岩中穿行。

sentences.sentence: With such thoughts in mind, most of the speeches seemed surreally beside the point.
sentences.translation: 如果抱着这样的想法，大部分演说似乎都偏离了主题。

sentences.sentence: You will produce a surreally beautiful salt that you can use on all kinds of things to make elegant, superfast, and easy meals.
sentences.translation: 你将制造出一种梦幻的盐，你可以使用在任何食物上面让它变的优雅、快熟、简单。
